ModelNumber.description: The model number of the lawn mower

SerialNumber.description: The serial number of the lawn mower

ProductType.description: The type of product described in the manual

IntendedUse.description: The intended use of the lawn mower as described in the manual

SafetyAlertSymbol.description: Symbol used to signal a hazard that may cause serious injury or death

Website.description: Website for more information, safety tips, and product registration

ServiceContact.description: Contact information for service, parts, or additional information

EnvironmentalNote.description: Environmental note regarding the side-discharge chute

CaliforniaRegulation.description: California Public Resource Code regulation regarding engine use

EngineManualInfo.description: Information regarding the engine owner's manual and emission control

Warning.description: California Proposition 65 warning about chemicals in the engine exhaust that may cause cancer, birth defects, or other reproductive harm

SafetyStandard.description: Safety standard that the machine complies with

GeneralSafetyInstructions.description: General safety instructions to prevent injury while using the machine

ManufacturerMark.description: Indicates that the blade is identified as a part from the original machine manufacturer

DangerDecal.description: Warning to keep hands and feet away from the machine

WarningDecal.description: List of warnings related to the operation and maintenance of the machine

CaliforniaWarning.description: Warning about cancer and reproductive harm specific to California regulations

SparkArresterWarning.description: Warning about the potential for sparks that can start fires and the need for a spark arrester

OilType.description: The viscosity or oil type description for the engine, like 10w30 or SAE 30

PrimaryFuelCapacity.description: Capacity of fuel or gas tank in gallons or liters or ounces

PrimaryOilCapacity.description: Engine oil capacity in Liters (l) or Ounces (oz)

ProblemDescription.description: Description of the problem, like the engine fails to start

Symptom.description: Symptom or how the problem presents to the consumer or user

Solution.description: Suggested potential fix or solution to the problem

Troubleshooting.description: List of typical problems and how to troubleshoot and fix

FuelCapacityDesc.description: Full text description of the capacity of the fuel or gas tank

OilCapacityDesc.description: Full text description of the engine oil capacity

PrimaryFuelCapacityUnitofMeasure.description: The unit of measurement of the fuel capacity, such as gallons or ounces

PrimaryOilCapacityUnitofMeasure.description: The unit of measurement of the engine oil capacity, like Liters or Ounces

SecondaryOilCapacity.description: The secondary oil capacity value if the capacity is defined in more than one way. Typically an integer or decimal

SecondaryOilCapacityUnitofMeasure.description: The unit of measurement associated with the secondary oil capacity, such as quarts, liters, or ounces.
